amendment.description: An amendment numbered 123 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funding for Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's firearm injury and mortality prevention research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller-Meeks amendment (A066) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 211 (Roll no. 674).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller-Meeks amendment (A066) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 211 (Roll no. 674).
